name: Reactive Railgun
description:
F11 to toggle fullscreen

In this game you play as a tiny robot on legs that runs on pure energy.  You use energy to shoot, live and shield yourself from danger. Kill Sphere-Bots to get their powercells and line up your shots to pierce a number of them at once to maximize your returns.

Game by Max Loboda and Lev Kamenskyi
Music by Section 31 -Tech 
Weapon sounds are from Nuclear Throne and were made by Joonas Turner @KissaKolme
